name: Past Your Bedtime
description:
Submission for 2022 Epic MegaJam

Team Name 1%Games

Developed by:
Nathan Flavel
Mason Talbot
Nick Simpson
Matthew Boldiston

Gameplay Instructions
Light the rooms to block the Shadow from getting to you.
Make sure to keep the generator running, to keep the lights on.
You can only see the shadow through your flashlight.,

WASD to Move
Space to Jump
F to toggle flashlight

What platform is your game built for?
Windows

List any content that was created before the jam.

Horror Engine - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/horror-engine

Old Brick House - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/old-brick-house
